titles.title: A concurrent resolution correcting the enrollment of S.1158.

vote.text: Submitted in the Senate, considered, and agreed to without amendment by Voice Vote.

action.text: Message on Senate action sent to the House.

bill.summary: 11/3/1987--Introduced. Makes corrections in the enrollment of S. 1158 (Public Health Service Amendments of 1987) as it relates to the period of obligated service under the National Health Service Corps Loan Repayment Program.
